section.heading: Advertising and Marketing Design
section.description: Ittisa one of India’s top full service digital marketing agency which has worked with big brands such as ITC, Reliance, Airtel, Dharma productions and many more. As a design intern I got the opportunity to work on social media content, banners, logo and UI design for multiple brands.

section.description: Qubag is a startup that currently provides services in Hyderabad and Vijayawada. It’s a subscription-based model also called as a micro delivery model of operations. Qubag fulfils the daily needs of customers with products such as - no prior shelf life, essentials, personal care items, and stationary products.
